ReadCSV.code:
class ReadCSV:
    def __init__(self, filepath):
        data = []
        f = open(filepath, "r")
        lines = f.readlines()
        for line in lines[1:]: # skip header
            if line.strip() == "": continue
            datum = [float(v) for v in line.split(",")]
            data.append(datum)
        self.data = data
